description: Signals that a player has validated their intent to equip a specific item instance from their inventory into a specific equipment slot. Note: Payloads use IDs for decoupling.

playerEntityId.description: The unique ID of the player entity attempting to equip.

itemInstanceIdToEquip.description: The unique ID of the item instance being equipped.

targetSlotId.description: The identifier of the equipment slot the item is intended for (e.g., 'core:slot_main_hand').
